description: It seems like today you might find little puddles around. Splashing in puddles is great fun!
Go to a museum and learn something new. You can do this when the weather is bad but also when the weather is good!
Fly a kite! Seems like there is enough wind for your kite to fly high.
Walk and play the in park. It could be a great time to make new friends.
Water freezes now. It could be a great chance to go ice skating outdoors.
Have a fancy picnic on the beach with your family!
Take your infatables and your swimming suit and go wimming at the beach.
There should be enough snow for making snow angels.
What about making a snowman? Take a carrot for the nose, chalk for the buttons and find brenches for the arms!
On a very cold day it's nice to drink hot chocolate or your favorite hot drink inside.
Make a puzzle with your family!
Go biking! Do not forget to wear a helmet.
Time to practice your art skills and draw on the sidewalk!
It's hot enough to play with water guns.
It's cold outside, so what about baking some cookies or cakes with friends and family?
Play football
Go hiking and explore new places!
Have a picnic in the park!
Visit the animals at the zoo!
Visit an attraction park - are you curageous enough for a scary ride?
Visit a playground and try all the slides.
Search for insects - how many insects do you recognize? Use your phone to learn more about the insects you see.
Snowball fight!
Go sailing if you live close to a body of water!
Build a wind chime and listen to it move in the wind.
Blow bubbles and look how pretty they are in the air.
Read books inside while the weather outside is a little harsh.
Play in pajamas, it's a little too cold to play outside now.
